DOC.brief_title: Emerging Adults Who Use Alcohol Marijuana
DOC.criteria: Be age 18 25 Binge drink ( 5 drink 2hour period men , 4 woman ) least monthly Use marijuana least weekly Have heterosexually active past six month Are marry Have live sexual romantic partner 6 month Be English speaking Reside within 20 mile Providence , RI plan stay geographic area next 15 month Provide contact information least two verifiable locator person Have DSMIV diagnosis drug abuse dependence ( nicotine , marijuana ) Have DSMIV diagnosis alcohol dependence
